page.title: 14HOME LIFE
page.content: On Saturdays I get up about nine o'clock,wash,dress and have my breakfast.I have Special K,toast and marmalade and a cup of tea.Then I check my hamster and rabbit to see if they have enough food and water.I switch the television on and watch Saturday Morning Picture Show or No.73 if its on.Then I might play football on my own and it will soon be dinnertime.For dinner I have a snack - sandwiches,crisps,a mousse and a Wispa bar. In the afternoon I clean out my hamster and rabbit.Then I go up to my friend's and we play football,cricket or badminton.I am up there a long time and when I get back I have my tea. Another boy I know rings his friend and they play with their catapults or on their bikes.They catapult tins and lamposts and ricochet stones.
